mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, t.code, t.authority_desc as authorityDesc, t.show_order as showOrder, t.pid, t1.role_id as roleId from t_authority t left join t_authority t2 on t.pid = t2.id left join t_role_authority t1 on t.id = t1.authority_id and t1.role_id = #{roleId} order by t2.show_order asc, t.show_order asc
